item.title: Audrey add a quote by Tite Kubo
item.description: "Ah, Kurosaki, I see you've finally realized the importance of a cape. ~Uryu Ishida" -- Tite Kubo

item.title: Audrey add a quote by Tite Kubo
item.description: "No one stands on the top of the world. Not you, not me, not even gods. But the unbearable vacancy of the throne in the sky is over. From now on... I will be sitting on it." -- Tite Kubo

item.title: Audrey add a quote by Tite Kubo
item.description: "There we go again, old men and their stupid arguments. What a pain. ~Toshiro Hitsugaya" -- Tite Kubo

item.title: Audrey add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Science without religion is lame, religion without science is blind." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Audrey add a quote by Maurice Switzer
item.description: "It is better to remain silent at the risk of being thought a fool, than to talk and remove all doubt of it." -- Maurice Switzer

item.title: Audrey add a quote by J K. Rowling
item.description: "I don't go looking for trouble. Trouble usually finds me." -- J K. Rowling

item.title: Audrey add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "The Road goes ever on and on Down from the door where it began. Now far ahead the Road has gone, And I must follow, if I can, Pursuing it with eager feet, Until it joins some larger way Where many paths and errands meet. And whither then? I cannot say" -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Audrey add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Audrey add a quote by Tite Kubo
item.description: "We should not shed tears That is a surrender of the body to the heart It is only proof That we are beings that do not know What to do with out hearts" -- Tite Kubo

item.title: Audrey add a quote by Katsura Hoshino
item.description:
"When there's something you can't understand no matter how much you think about it, you can't let yourself brood over it forever.
~Allen Walker" -- Katsura Hoshino

item.title: Audrey add a quote by Tite Kubo
item.description: "People have hope because they cannot see Death standing behind them." -- Tite Kubo

item.title: Audrey add a quote by Tite Kubo
item.description: "As of now, ALL your opinions are rejected." - Ichigo" -- Tite Kubo

item.title: Audrey add a quote by Tite Kubo
Audrey add a quote by Paul Terry
item.description: "Whenever I feel the need to exercise, I lie down until it goes away." -- Paul Terry

item.title: Audrey add a quote by Tite Kubo
item.description:
"Ichigo: You got that? Huh?! I'm the rescuer, so you just SHUT UP!!
Rukia: Wha--wha'd you say? A rescuer isn't supposed to ignore the rescuee!
Ichigo: Yeah? And what kind of rescuee complains about the rescue!? Why don't you go sit in a corner and tremble in fear and cry out "Save me! Save me!" like you're supposed to?!
Rukia: I do not need saving, and I do <i>NOT</i> tremble!" -- Tite Kubo

item.title: Audrey add a quote by William Shakespeare
Audrey add a quote by Cassandra Clare
item.description: "The meek may inherit the earth, but at the moment it belongs to the conceited. Like me." -- Cassandra Clare

item.title: Audrey add a quote by Tite Kubo
item.description: "We think a flower on a cliff is beautiful Because we stop our feet at the cliff's edge Unable to step out into the sky Like that fearless flower --Sosuke Aizen,Flower on the Precipice" -- Tite Kubo

item.title: Audrey add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: Audrey add a quote by Cassandra Clare
item.description: "I can only assume," said Jace, "that mortal emotions amuse you because you have none of your own." -- Cassandra Clare

item.title: Audrey add a quote by cassandra clare
item.description: "Isabella with her whip and boots and knives would chop anyone who tried to pen her up in a tower into pieces, build a bridge out of the remains, and walk carelessly to freedom, her hair looking fabulous the entire time." -- cassandra clare

item.title: Audrey add a quote by mark twain
item.description: "But who prays for Satan? Who, in eighteen centuries, has had the common humanity to pray for the one sinner that needed it most?" -- mark twain

item.title: Audrey add a quote by Katsura Hoshino
item.description: "Don't underestimate us nerds!" -- Katsura Hoshino

item.title: Audrey add a quote by Arakawa Hiromu
item.description: "Stand up and walk. Move on. After all, you have perfect legs to stand on." -- Arakawa Hiromu

item.title: Audrey add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "I don't know half of you half as well as I should like; and I like less than half of you half as well as you deserve." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Audrey add a quote by J. R. R. Tolkien
item.description: "Three Rings for the Elven-kings under the sky, Seven for the Dwarf-lords in halls of stone, Nine for Mortal Men, doomed to die, One for the Dark Lord on his dark throne In the Land of Mordor where the Shadows lie. One Ring to rule them all, One Ring to find them, One Ring to bring them all and in the darkness bind them. In the Land of Mordor where the Shadows lie." -- J. R. R. Tolkien

item.title: Audrey add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "I wish it need not have happened in my time," said Frodo. "So do I," said Gandalf, "and so do all who live to see such times. But that is not for them to decide. All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given us." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Audrey add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "Deserves it! I daresay he does. Many that live deserve death. And some that die deserve life. Can you give it to them? Then do not be too eager to deal out death in judgement. For even the very wise cannot see all ends." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Audrey add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description:
"All that is gold does not glitter, Not all those who wander are lost; The old that is strong does not wither, Deep roots are not reached by the frost.
From the ashes a fire shall be woken, A light from the shadows shall spring; Renewed shall be blade that was broken, The crownless again shall be king." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Audrey add a quote by Socrates
item.description: "The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing." -- Socrates
